alert.note: Alert for Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Greenup, west central Gallia and northwestern Lawrence Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wheelersburg, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, New Boston, Greenup, Franklin Furnace, Gallia, Vernon, Raceland, Worthington, South Shore, Wurtland, Hanging Rock, Haverhill, Sciotoville, Grays Branch, Pedro and Centerpoint. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
